FuncDef: This command creates the context to configure a group of SNMP trap receivers and their operational parameters for a given log-id.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the log ID value of a log configured in the log-id context. Alarms and traps cannot be sent to the trap receivers until a valid log-id exists. Values-1 to 99.

ExtraInfo: Default: There are no default SNMP trap groups.
